'''Evernight Raven''' is [[Fischl]]'s Level 6 [[Constellation]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* DMG dealt by joint attacks is considered [[Elemental Skill]] DMG.
* This constellation is triggered by every execution of a [[Normal Attack]] regardless if it hits, as long as the enemy is within a certain range that is slightly higher than Oz's attacks in Fischl's regular [[Nightrider|Elemental Skill]].
** This constellation is not triggered by [[Charged Attacks]], [[Plunging Attacks]], Elemental Skills, or [[Elemental Bursts]].
